translation: Among thousands of men, one may perchance strive for perfection; even among those successful strivers, only one may perchance know Me in essence.
commentary: 7.3 of men of men? In thousands among thousands? Someone some one? Yati strives? Siddhaye for perfection? strive of the striving ones? Even even? Siddhanaam of the successful ones? Someone some one? Maam Me? Vetti knows? Tattvata in essence.Commentary Mark how difficult it is to attain to the knowledge of the Self or to how Brahman in essence. Siddhanam literally means those who have attained perfection
